1617260.name: Bygone Dreams Original Soundtrack
1617260.description: Boasting over 2 hours of music spread across 51 tracks, the Bygone Dreams Original Soundtrack captures the sense of awe and beauty found throughout the game's iconic dream world. From the melancholic garden to the action-packed depths of the nightmare, all tracks were composed and recorded specifically for the game, sure to find a home in every game OST connoisseur's playlist.
